persona.name: Dr. Thomas Perls
persona.personality: Inquisitive and knowledgeable, with a focus on empirical research and a commitment to understanding the complexities of aging.
persona.employment: Associate Professor of Medicine and Geriatrics
persona.communication_style: Clear and informative, emphasizes the importance of research and careful consideration of findings.
persona.notes: Founder and director of the New England Centenarian Study, actively involved in studying genetic factors related to exceptional longevity.
